title.rendered: WEB DEVELOPERS – HOW TO GENERATE TRAFFIC WITH SEO ?

content.rendered:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=14uUVxYoW6E

I’ve created a new playlist on my channel dedicated to answering your questions and comments in video format.

Q&A #2 – Thank you, Fabio Peters from Montreal

1. What do you think Web Developers should focus on in terms of SEO and generating traffic in 2018?
2. How do you go about finding the right keywords and long tail keywords?
3. Which WordPress plugins are best for SEO?
4. Do you recommend www.semrush.com?

If you have 1-5 question(s), please be specific and I will try my best to answer a few questions a week.

I appreciate the love and support, it truly means the world to me.

 

Chris A. Hughes
